results.name: Tersum n + 2.
comment: Tersum m + n: write m and n in base 3 and add mod 3 with no carries, e.g. 5 + 8 = "21" + "22" = "10" = 1.
Also Sprague-Grundy values for game of Wyt Queens.
reference: E. R. Berlekamp, J. H. Conway and R. K. Guy, Winning Ways, Academic Press, NY, 2 vols., 1982, see p. 76.
link: A. Dress, A. Flammenkamp and N. Pink, Additive periodicity of the Sprague-Grundy function of certain Nim games, Adv. Appl. Math., 22, p. 249-270 (1999).
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,1,-1).
formula: Periodic with period and saltus 3: a(n) = 3[ n/3 ] + ((n+2) mod 3).
mathematica: a[n_] := If[Divisible[n, 3], n+2, n-1]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 70}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Oct 25 2013 *)
